tool_description: Identifies and categorizes technical and soft skills from resume text using keyword matching and context analysis.

resume_text.description: The full text content of the resume

skill_categories.description: Specific skill categories to focus on

include_soft_skills.description: Include soft skills and interpersonal abilities

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score (0-1) for skill extraction

error_messages: Empty resume text: Provide non-empty resume_text content for processing.
Invalid skill categories: Use valid categories like technical, soft, language, tools, or domain-specific categories.
Invalid confidence threshold: confidence_threshold must be between 0 and 1.
No skills found: The resume may not contain recognizable skills or the confidence threshold may be too high.
usage: Pass resume_text and optionally specify skill_categories to focus on particular types of skills. Adjust confidence_threshold to control the strictness of skill identification.

technical_skills.description: Programming languages, frameworks, and technical tools

skill_confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each identified skill
